name: Nyaminyami (Zambezi)
shortLoreBlurb: Nyaminyami (Zambezi) is a deity/serpent from Tonga (Zambezi) associated with river serpent, kariba. Serpents mark thresholds and hidden wisdom. Appeased for safe passage and rains.
overlapsLinks: Fafnir (Norse), Jörmungandr (Norse), Manannán (Celtic), Naga (India/SE Asia), Poseidon (Greek), Quetzalcoatl (Aztec), Tangaroa (Polynesia), Yemaya (Yoruba)
description: Nyaminyami (Zambezi) is a deity/serpent from Tonga (Zambezi) associated with river serpent, kariba. Serpents mark thresholds and hidden wisdom. Appeased for safe passage and rains.
